books.title: The Haunting of Hill House
books.author: Shirley Jackson
books.description: A chilling tale of a haunted mansion that has stood for 80 years, featuring four people who come to stay there and experience its sinister power.

books.title: It
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: Pennywise the Dancing Clown terrorizes the small town of Derry, Maine, in this masterful horror novel by Stephen King.

books.title: Dracula
books.author: Bram Stoker
books.description: Bram Stoker's iconic novel about Count Dracula, a vampire who threatens the safety of London, is a classic horror story that has stood the test of time.

books.title: Psycho
books.author: Robert Bloch
books.description: Robert Bloch's psychological thriller about the unsettling events at the Bates Motel and the mysterious Norman Bates is a true horror classic.

books.title: Bird Box
books.author: Josh Malerman
books.description: Josh Malerman's post-apocalyptic horror novel tells the story of a mother and her two children, blindfolded and trying to survive in a world filled with supernatural creatures that drive people to madness.

books.title: The Shining
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: Stephen King's classic story of the Torrance family's descent into madness while serving as caretakers for the haunted Overlook Hotel is a must-read for horror fans.

books.title: The Exorcist
books.author: William Peter Blatty
books.description: William Peter Blatty's tale of the demonic possession of a young girl and the desperate exorcism attempts to save her soul is a terrifying and unforgettable horror story.

books.title: Hell House
books.author: Richard Matheson
books.description: Richard Matheson's novel follows a team of researchers who enter the notorious Belasco House, known as the Mount Everest of haunted houses, to uncover its dark secrets.

books.title: The Silence of the Lambs
books.author: Thomas Harris
books.description: Thomas Harris's thriller introduces the brilliant but insane Dr. Hannibal Lecter and FBI trainee Clarice Starling, who must consult him to catch a serial killer known as Buffalo Bill.

books.title: The Girl with All the Gifts
books.author: M.R. Carey
books.description: M.R. Carey's post-apocalyptic thriller follows a group of survivors, including a young girl with a mysterious gift, as they navigate a world overrun by fungal zombies.

books.title: American Psycho
books.author: Bret Easton Ellis
books.description: Bret Easton Ellis's novel follows the life of Patrick Bateman, a wealthy investment banker who also happens to be a psychopathic serial killer.

books.title: The Ruins
books.author: Scott Smith
books.description: Scott Smith's horror novel tells the story of a group of American tourists who venture into the Mexican jungle and discover an ancient, malevolent force that lurks within the ruins.

books.title: House of Leaves
books.author: Mark Z. Danielewski
books.description: Mark Z. Danielewski's innovative and mind-bending novel explores a family's experience in a labyrinthine, ever-changing house that defies the laws of physics and reality.

books.title: The Babadook
books.author: Jennifer Kent
books.description: Jennifer Kent's horror film's novelization tells the story of a mother and her troubled son who are haunted by a sinister creature known as the Babadook.

books.title: The Ritual
books.author: Adam Nevill
books.description: Adam Nevill's horror novel follows a group of old friends who embark on a hiking trip in the Scandinavian wilderness, only to encounter ancient evil and terror.

books.title: Annihilation
books.author: Jeff VanderMeer
books.description: Jeff VanderMeer's novel follows an expedition into a mysterious and dangerous area known as Area X, where the laws of nature seem to be twisted and reality itself is uncertain.

books.title: Coraline
books.author: Neil Gaiman
books.description: Neil Gaiman's dark fantasy novella follows a young girl named Coraline who discovers a parallel world where everything seems perfect, but sinister secrets lurk beneath the surface.

books.title: Heart-Shaped Box
books.author: Joe Hill
books.description: Joe Hill's debut novel follows an aging rock star who buys a haunted suit online, only to find himself haunted by the vengeful ghost of its former owner.

books.title: The Fisherman
books.author: John Langan
books.description: John Langan's horror novel follows two widowers who find solace in fishing, only to encounter a terrifying creature and ancient evil in the waters of upstate New York.

books.title: Let the Right One In
books.author: John Ajvide Lindqvist
books.description: John Ajvide Lindqvist's novel tells the story of a bullied young boy who befriends a mysterious girl next door, only to discover she is a centuries-old vampire.
